languages.text: "Мое почтение, Ваше Преосвященство. Насколько мне известно, в вашем ведении находилось распределение ресурсов {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Адептус Министорум{/g}... весьма удачное совпадение с учетом того, куда в итоге привел ваш удел". {n}Кунрад тонко улыбается — то ли вам, то ли своим мыслям.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мое почтение, Ваше Преосвященство. Насколько мне известно, в вашем ведении находилось распределение ресурсов Адептус Министорум... весьма удачное совпадение с учетом того, куда в итоге привел ваш удел". {n}Кунрад тонко улыбается — то ли вам, то ли своим мыслям.{/n}

languages.text: "My regards, Your Reverence. As far as I am aware, you were in charge of resource distribution for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... A rather fortunate coincidence, considering where fate has brought you in the end." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мое почтение, Ваше Преосвященство. Насколько мне известно, в вашем ведении находилось распределение ресурсов {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Адептус Министорум{/g}... весьма удачное совпадение с учетом того, куда в итоге привел ваш удел". {n}Кунрад тонко улыбается — то ли вам, то ли своим мыслям.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "My regards, Your Reverence. As far as I am aware, you were in charge of resource distribution for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... A rather fortunate coincidence, considering where fate has brought you in the end." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly — either at you or to himself.{/n}

A rather fortunate coincidence, considering where fate has brought you in the end." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

"My regards, Your Reverence. As far as I am aware, you were in charge of resource distribution for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... A rather fortunate coincidence, considering where fate has brought you in the end." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

languages.text: “向您致意，尊敬的阁下。据我所知，您曾负责过{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教教会{/g}的资源分配工作……考虑到命运接下来的安排，这样的巧合还真是相当幸运。”{n}维特威尔微微一笑，但你不太确定这个笑容是不是对你露出来的。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Your Reverence. As far as I am aware, you were in charge of resource distribution for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... A rather fortunate coincidence, considering where fate has brought you in the end." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “向您致意，尊敬的阁下。据我所知，您曾负责过{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教教会{/g}的资源分配工作……考虑到命运接下来的安排，这样的巧合还真是相当幸运。”{n}维特威尔微微一笑，但你不太确定这个笑容是不是对你露出来的。{/n}

languages.text: «Saludos, su reverencia. Hasta donde sé, estuvo a cargo de la distribución de recursos del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... Una coincidencia muy afortunada, visto adónde ha acabado conduciéndol{mf|e|a} el destino». {n}Voigtvir esboza una sonrisa débil, pero no sabes si está dirigida a ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Your Reverence. As far as I am aware, you were in charge of resource distribution for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... A rather fortunate coincidence, considering where fate has brought you in the end." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Saludos, su reverencia. Hasta donde sé, estuvo a cargo de la distribución de recursos del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... Una coincidencia muy afortunada, visto adónde ha acabado conduciéndol{mf|e|a} el destino». {n}Voigtvir esboza una sonrisa débil, pero no sabes si está dirigida a ti.{/n}

languages.text: 「よろしくお願いします、尊師様。私の知る限り、あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国宗務局{/g}の資源分配の責任者でした…運命があなたを最終的にどこに導いたかを考えると、かなり幸運な偶然です」{n}ボイトヴィルはかすかに微笑んだが、それが自分に向けられたものであるか、あなたにはわからない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Your Reverence. As far as I am aware, you were in charge of resource distribution for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... A rather fortunate coincidence, considering where fate has brought you in the end." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「よろしくお願いします、閣下。私の知る限り、あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国宗務局{/g}の資源分配の責任者でした…運命があなたを最終的にどこに導いたかを考えると、かなり幸運な偶然です」{n}ボイドヴィルは、かすかに微笑んだが、それが自分に向けられたものであるか、あなたにはわからない。{/n}
「よろしくお願いします、尊師様。私の知る限り、あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国宗務局{/g}の資源分配の責任者でした…運命があなたを最終的にどこに導いたかを考えると、かなり幸運な偶然です」{n}ボイトヴィルはかすかに微笑んだが、それが自分に向けられたものであるか、あなたにはわからない。{/n}

languages.original_text: "My regards, Your Reverence. As far as I am aware, you were in charge of resource distribution for the Adeptus Ministorum... A rather fortunate coincidence, considering where fate has brought you in the end." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

languages.text: « Mes hommages, Votre Révérence. Sauf erreur de ma part, vous étiez responsable de la distribution des ressources au sein de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... Une heureuse coïncidence compte tenu du sort le destin vous a réservé. » {n}Voigtvir esquisse un faible sourire, mais vous n'êtes pas {mf|sûr|sûre} qu'il vous est destiné.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Your Reverence. As far as I am aware, you were in charge of resource distribution for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... A rather fortunate coincidence, considering where fate has brought you in the end." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mes hommages, Votre Révérence. Sauf erreur de ma part, vous étiez responsable de la distribution des ressources au sein de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... Une heureuse coïncidence compte tenu du sort le destin vous a réservé. » {n}Voigtvir esquisse un faible sourire, mais vous n'êtes pas {mf|sûr|sûre} qu'il vous est destiné.{/n}

languages.text: "Sehr erfreut, Hochwürden. Soweit ich weiß, wart Ihr für die Ressourcenverteilung des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g} zuständig ... Ein recht glücklicher Zufall, wenn man bedenkt, wohin das Schicksal Euch am Ende geführt hat." {n}Voigtvir lächelt schmal, aber du bist nicht sicher, ob es dir gilt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Your Reverence. As far as I am aware, you were in charge of resource distribution for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... A rather fortunate coincidence, considering where fate has brought you in the end." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sehr erfreut, Hochwürden. Soweit ich weiß, wart Ihr für die Ressourcenverteilung des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g} zuständig ... Ein recht glücklicher Zufall, wenn man bedenkt, wohin das Schicksal Euch am Ende geführt hat." {n}Voigtvir lächelt schmal, aber du bist nicht sicher, ob es dir gilt.{/n}

languages.text: "Saygılarımı sunarım hürmetli Başdiyakoz. Bildiğim kadarıyla {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g} için kaynak dağıtımdan sorumluydunuz. Kaderin sizi getirdiği yer düşünülürse ne talihli bir tesadüf." {n}Voigtvir, belli belirsiz gülümsese de sana mı yönelttiğinden emin olamıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Your Reverence. As far as I am aware, you were in charge of resource distribution for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... A rather fortunate coincidence, considering where fate has brought you in the end." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

Kaderin sizi getirdiği yer düşünülürse ne talihli bir tesadüf." {n}Voigtvir, belli belirsiz gülümsese de sana mı yönelttiğinden emin olamıyorsun.{/n}
